about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi ðŸ‘‹, I'm Kevin Pillaca, passionate about technology and trained in Computer and Systems Engineering. My journey began in the world of graphic design and technical support, where I discovered how much I enjoy creating practical solutions and adding value to real-world problems.
about.p2: Over time, graphic design sparked my interest in interface design, so I started creating prototypes in Figma, gaining a deeper understanding of the importance of user experience in a project.
about.p3: From there, I decided to move forward and fully dive into web development. I started with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and since then I have developed real websites for clients, which strengthened my experience and motivated me to keep growing.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore some of the solutions I have recently built.
projects.webDesc: Website developed for a graphic printing company, focused on presenting its printing services in a clear and visually appealing way. It facilitates direct contact with clients and strengthens the business's professional digital presence.
projects.appDesc: Web application designed to replace manual management in a graphic printing business, digitizing client records, payments, products, and quotations. The platform provides better business control through a login system, database, and centralized web access.
projects.portfolioDesc: Personal web portfolio developed with Angular and TypeScript, featuring GSAP animations and practical application of my knowledge in modern web development, design best practices, and user experience.
